vsParam:
Radiata, we made super good nutrients!
Any flower will bounce back with it!

Thank you so much for all that you do!
I hope it works this time... Please!

E-everyone, look!
The leaves... and the flower... have all recovered now! It worked!

The nutrients... are awesome! I think they're as effective
as the Ever-nutrient Soil.

That's the nutrient soil specially cultivated for this flower.
Each time the cultivation costs us the Ambrosias 500 years.

F-five hundred years!?
It's so long...

I think maybe an alchemist as impressive as [px]
could make the Ever-nutrient Soil!

[px]! Could you synthesize the Ever-nutrient Soil for us
in 500 years!?

F-five hundred years...
[px], what do you think?
I... I think it's a bit hard...
By then, it may be my great great great grandson...

I-is that so!?
Um, sorry to put you on the spot...
Anyway, I could get the flower out of the soil for now!

Um... Thank you so much for going out of your way
to help someone you just met!

Hehe, you're welcome.
We're supposed to help those in trouble!

Haha, well said!
Now we should go to find Lycoris.
Oh, um, can I go with you if it's not too much trouble?

Lycoris hasn't come back yet.
I can't wait any longer...

Yeah, let's go find her together.
Radiata, welcome to join us!

Yes!
It's my honor to join you!
